metadata.name: Labelled x Black Scale #1
metadata.description: Labelled, a forward thinking web 2.5 brand and the ‘World’s First Phygital Concept Store’ has partnered with fashion brand Black Scale (the first of many to brands to come) to launch a limited edition phygital T-shirt that unlocks utilities through the minting of an NFT, utilizing a physical backed token embedded into the garment. The T-shirt is authenticated using blockchain technology, with only 777 pieces available, adding to the exclusivity and collectible value of the NFTs. This collaboration represents a groundbreaking fusion of fashion, art, and technology, offering a unique and innovative way for customers to engage with brands and access exclusive digital content.
